mean_cn: adj.专心的，注意的；肯帮忙的
mean_en: listening or watching carefully and with interest; helpful; making sure that people have what they need
sentence: He was very attentive in class, unlike his deskmate, who dozed off.
sentence_trans: 他上课非常认真，不像他的同桌在打瞌睡。
word_etyma: at向 + tent延伸 + ive……的 → 向……延伸的 → attentive关心周到的
